title: How to Lose a Wife and Find a Lover

sources.title: How To Lose A Wife And Find A Lover ( 1978)
sources.description: FOR ADULTS ONLY! 18+ Original title: Come perdere una moglie e trovare un'amante Castelli is an advertising executive who, having returned home early due to a car accident with Eleonora Rubens, a young Dutch woman abandoned by her husband, surprises his American wife in intimacy with the plumber.
